com.ftpos.library.smartpos.keymanager

Interface EncryptionPaddingMode


  • public interface EncryptionPaddingMode
    Copyright (C), 2015-2020,FEITIAN Technologies Co., Ltd. All rights reserved. The padding mode of symmetric encryption.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PADDING_MODE_9797_1_M2
      Padding according to ISO IEC 9797-1 specification, Mode 2
      static int PADDING_MODE_DEK_P
      Padding according to DEK_P specification, Mode 0x11
      static int PADDING_MODE_NONE
      Without padding data.
      static int PADDING_MODE_PKCS5
      Padding according to PKCS#5 specification (Compatibility with PKCS#7).

    • Field Detail
